instruction: Suggest an interesting book to read.
output: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo by Stieg Larsson is an excellent and captivating mystery novel with complex characters, a gripping story and interesting plot twists. Set in Sweden, the story follows journalist Mikael Blomkvist and hacker Lisbeth Salander as they investigate a 40-year-old unsolved murder and uncover a dark web of secrecy and crime. With mesmerising writing and carefully crafted characters, this book is sure to keep you reading until the very end.
